author: Sanjeev Miglani
title: South Asia coronavirus cases top 37,000, headache for govts eyeing lockdown end
description: South Asia's coronavirus infections have crossed 37,000, with more than half in India, official data showed on Thursday, complicating the task of governments looking to scale back lockdowns that have destroyed the livelihoods of millions.
content: NEW DELHI (Reuters) - South Asia’s coronavirus infections have crossed 37,000, with more than half in India, official data showed on Thursday, complicating the task of governments looking to scale back lockdowns that have destroyed the livelihoods of millions… [+2738 chars]
